name: lubelogger
description: LubeLog helps car owners track maintenance, repairs, and fuel usage across multiple vehicles. Its self-hosted web UI includes reporting and reminders for keeping vehicle service history in one place.
features: Maintenance Tracking: Service records, Repair history, Parts replacement. Track all vehicle maintenance activities.
Fuel Logging: Fuel consumption, Cost tracking, Efficiency analysis. Monitor fuel usage and expenses.
Service Reminders: Scheduled maintenance, Mileage-based alerts, Custom reminders. Never miss important service dates.
Multi-Vehicle: Manage multiple cars, Fleet tracking, Vehicle profiles. Track all your vehicles in one place.
Cost Analysis: Expense reports, Cost per mile, Budget tracking. Understand your vehicle ownership costs.
Document Storage: Upload receipts, Service documents, Warranty info. Keep all vehicle documents organized.
Reporting: Maintenance history, Cost summaries, Export data. Generate comprehensive vehicle reports.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, Full data control, No subscriptions. Own your vehicle maintenance data.
